labMessage: This Recon-ng simulation uses pre-recorded demo data. Commands, flows, and artifacts stay inside the browser for authorized lab exercises only.

playbooks.title: Baseline Survey Walkthrough
playbooks.description: Kick off a sanitized recon session that chains DNS discovery, WHOIS enrichment, and reverse IP context.

steps.title: Enumerate DNS
steps.details: Run the built-in DNS Enumeration module against example.com to hydrate the workspace with the canned host records.
steps.expect: Graph adds the example.com node linked to the sanitized IP asset.

steps.title: Review WHOIS
steps.details: Pivot into the WHOIS Lookup module to surface registrar metadata sourced from the fixtures.
steps.expect: Entities table records the placeholder contacts with no live queries executed.

steps.title: Reverse IP Context
steps.details: Use Reverse IP Lookup to illustrate how additional domains are discovered in the canned dataset.
steps.expect: Workspace graph expands with demo hosts connected to the shared lab IP.

steps.title: Capture Findings
steps.details: Open the Report Templates panel and export the markdown summary to show the offline reporting workflow.
steps.expect: Exported report references only sanitized fixtures and lab guidance.

playbooks.title: Profile a SaaS Tenant (Demo Data)
playbooks.description: Demonstrate how Recon-ng workspaces track assets and findings for a SaaS perimeter using pre-built fixtures.

steps.title: Set Workspace
steps.details: Create a workspace for demo-saas.local using the workspace selector in the app header.
steps.expect: Workspace label updates, but no backend calls are made.

steps.title: Import Host Snapshot
steps.details: From the Marketplace, add the Recon Notebook module and tag it with 'saas-demo'.
steps.expect: Script tag persistence confirms offline storage.

steps.title: Run TLS Check
steps.details: Switch to SSL Checker to review the expired certificate metadata bundled with the dataset.
steps.expect: Output highlights deprecated cipher suites from fixtures only.
